prompt: ### Human: "¿Cómo obtuvieron los estados de EE. UU. sus nombres?"### Assistant:
system:
Los estados de EE. UU. (conocidos como el "Estado", y a veces "Estado de EE. UU.") son los 50 territorios del país. Aunque todos ellos han sido estados desde la época de la Revolución, la mayoría se establecieron como territorios durante los últimos 150 años. Los primeros colonos se establecieron en el noreste, en el área que luego se convertiría en Nueva York y Nueva Jersey, pero no fueron los primeros estados de EE. UU. en ser reconocidos por el Congreso. Esto fue en 1776, cuando los 13 colonias declararon su independencia de Gran Bretaña y formaron el "Estado de EE. UU." En 1788, estos estados ratificaron la "Constitución", que estableció una república federal en lugar de un gobierno centralizado. Esto fue el momento en que se convirtieron en los estados que conocemos hoy.

Los 13 estados originales fueron:

*  Massachusetts
*  Connecticut
*  Rhode Island y Providence Plantations
* Nueva York
* Nueva Jersey
* Pensilvania
* Delaware
* Maryland
* Virginia
* Carolina del Norte
* Carolina del Sur
* Georgia
* New Hampshire
* Vermont
* Kentucky (formado como estado en 1792)

Además, estos estados iniciales también incluyeron partes de lo que hoy es Ohio (Nueva Ohio), Indiana (Nuevo Pensilvania), Illinois (Nueva Francia), y Michigan (Nueva Inglaterra). Muchos de estos territorios, aunque nunca fueron parte de los estados originales, se han convertido en estados a lo largo del tiempo: Indiana (1816), Illinois (1818), Ohio (1803), Maine (1820), Missouri (1821), Texas (1845), Iowa (1846), Wisconsin (1848), Minnesota (1858) y Kansas (1861). Del mismo modo, otros territorios más pequeños fueron anexados a estados más grandes. Por ejemplo, Wisconsin fue parte de Minnesota hasta que se convirtió en un estado independiente. De manera similar, Dakota del Norte fue parte de Dakota del Sur hasta que se convirtió en un estado independiente; Dakota del Sur fue parte de Nebraska hasta que se convirtió en un estado independiente; y Montana fue parte de Idaho hasta que se convirtió en un estado independiente. En todos estos casos, los territorios más pequeños fueron anexados a los territorios más grandes; esto fue la norma hasta principios del siglo XX. Sin embargo, Montana y Wyoming fueron creadas como territorios independientes; no fueron anexadas a otro territorio. Los últimos estados creados fueron Alaska y Hawái, ambos durante la era del Territorio Organizado; ambos han sido estados desde entonces.
source: "¿Cómo obtuvieron los estados de EE. UU. sus nombres?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Cómo puedo envolver un regalo de forma ordenada?"### Assistant:
system:
Un envolvente es un material que se utiliza para proteger o envuelve un regalo. La decoración y el diseño de un envolvente son vitales para agradar al destinatario y lograr que su regalo sea memorable. Depende de la ocasión, la persona a la que se le envía el regalo y las preferencias de la persona que lo envía. El envolvente puede ser simple o decorado.

### Tips

* La carta es un elemento importante del regalo. Los envolveres de carta son fáciles de hacer y sirven para cubrir la carta. Envolver una carta es más difícil porque hay que colocarla al revés de como se escribe. Envolver una carta es más fácil si se ha escrito correctamente en primer lugar. El papel debe estar bien orientado, ya que no se puede colocar una carta con el texto hacia adentro del paquete.
* Una bolsa es un tipo de envolvente de uso común. Usa un cierre hermético para evitar que los regalos se desgarren o se estropeen durante el transporte. Usa papel de embalaje o papel celofán para cubrir la bolsa. Las bolsas son populares para enviar regalos a través del correo postal y entregarlos personalesmente.
* Un paquete cerrado es una bolsa sellada con un cierre hermético y a menudo viene con una etiqueta pre-impresa. Los paquetes cerrados son convenientes porque no hay que abrirlos, pero se sabe que no pueden ser abiertos por la persona a quien se les envía. Pueden ser hechos por el usuario, aunque están disponibles para compra en tiendas especializadas o por línea.
* Los envases son una opción decorativa para envueltos simples, como pequeños regalos de Nochebuena, almuerzos navideños o paquetes de Navidad para los niños. Las decoraciones pueden incluir banderolas, trozos de papel, flores artificiales o etiquetas pre-impresas. Un envase puede ser fácil de abrir y solo servir como decoración para el regalo o bien usarlo como envolvente completo, aunque esto puede resultar complicado y no es recomendable si el regalo se transporta por correo postal o se mueve mucho durante su transporte. Algunos envases están hechos de materiales reciclables para disminuir la contaminación global.
* Las películas son una opción decorativa más elaborada para un envolvente de regalo; puedes usar películas de colores diferentes sobre los envases (por ejemplo, un color blanco con un color rojo) o usar varias películas de colores distintos sobre el mismo paquete. Las películas pueden incluir estrellas y otros motivos festivos (por ejemplo, navideños). También puedes usar cuadros (por ejemplo, santos navideños) sobre las películas para darle un toque personalizado al paquete. El diseño más elaborado puede usarse con etiquetas pre-impresas personalizadas (por ejemplo, las etiquetas pre-impresas pueden tener los nombres completos del destinatario). Esto es especialmente útil cuando hay muchos regalos a entregar o cuando los recién casados reciben muchos regalos durante su luna de miel y desean tenerlos organizados y ordenados cuando lleguen a casa después del viaje; esto puede evitar problemas en los lugares donde el número de personas supera la capacidad del lugar (por ejemplo, dormitorios pequeños). Un envolvente decorado puede también usarse para enviar comida a alguien enfermo o recibir comida sin tener que abrirla antes del momento previsto (por ejemplo, Nochebuena). Los envíos comerciales pueden utilizar este tipo de envolvente, así como las empresas que van a presentaciones a otras compañías (por ejemplo, empresas comerciales que venden productos alimenticios). Las películas pueden usarse con tela doble o sin ella (si lo deseas). Esto depende del propósito del envolvente: si los regalos son inmunes a daños (por ejemplo, si solo contienen joyería
source: "¿Cómo puedo envolver un regalo de forma ordenada?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Cómo puedo cortar en cubitos sin cortarme el dedo?"### Assistant:

*   Tip 1: Cortar en cubitos con una herramienta especializada. Es un cortador de cubitos especializado que permite cortar en cubitos sin cortarse el dedo. En el mercado hay diversos modelos y tamaños disponibles para cubitar cualquier dedo.

*   Tip 2: Cortar en cubitos con la mano y un cuchillo. Utiliza tu mano derecha como una guía para cortar los cubitos de manera segura.

*   Tip 3: Cortar en cubitos con la mano y un cuchillo de mesa. Se usa el cuchillo de mesa para cortar los cubitos mientras que la mano sirve como guía para poder cortar los cubitos sin cortarse el dedo.

*   Tip 4: Cortar en cubitos con la mano y un cuchillo de plástico. Si tienes un cuchillo de plástico a mano, puedes utilizarlo para cortar los cubitos sin cortarte el dedo.

*   Tip 5: Cortar en cubitos con una hoja dentada. Utiliza una hoja dentada o serrucho para cortar los cubitos. Un serrucho es ideal para este trabajo ya que es relativamente cómodo y no se hacen cortes profundos en el dedo. Una vez que tienes la hoja dentada puedes utilizarla para hacer cortes delgados y suaves en el dedo.

*   Tip 6: Cortar en cubitos con un papel de aluminio apretado. Utiliza un papel de aluminio apretado, como un papel higiénico o papel de tela, para hacer un corte limpio en el dedo. *   Tip 7: Cortar en cubitos con una pala dentada. Utiliza una pala dentada para cortar los cubitos. Una pala dentada es ideal porque es fácil de usar y hace cortes profundos pero no profundos en tu dedo. Asegúrate de tener bien seguro la pala dentada antes de hacer los corte delgados sobre tu dedo, o puede que se te caiga accidentalmente y se te corte algo más profundo del que necesitas.

prompt: ### Human: "¿Quién es Larry Page?"### Assistant:
system:
Larry Page is an American computer scientist and Internet entrepreneur who co-founded Google with Sergey Brin. He is the CEO of Alphabet, Google's parent company, and has a net worth of $109.5 billion, making him the ninth-richest person in the world as of February 2022.

Page was born in Michigan in 1973 and attended the University of Michigan, where he studied computer science and earned a bachelor's degree in 1995. He then attended Stanford University, where he earned a master's degree and PhD in computer science. After graduating from Stanford, Page began working on search engine technology with Brin and launched Google in 1998.

Page has been involved in several other technology companies besides Google. He co-founded the artificial intelligence startup DeepMind in 2010, which was later acquired by Google. He also co-founded Calico, a biotech company that aims to develop technologies that can extend human lifespans, and led the development of Fusion, a data center energy technology.

Page stepped down as CEO of Alphabet, Google's parent company, in January 2018 but continues to serve as CEO of Google and a member of Alphabet's board of directors. Under his leadership, Google has grown into one of the world's largest technology companies and has made significant contributions to the field of search engine technology. He has been recognized for his entrepreneurship and philanthropy, including being named one of Time magazine's "100 Most Influential People" in 2004 and 2013 and being named a Young Global Leader by the World Economic Forum in 2005.

Page is known for his visionary approach to technology and his focus on innovation and disruption. He has been outspoken about the potential for technology to solve some of society's biggest problems, including climate change and healthcare. His net worth is primarily derived from his ownership stake in Alphabet and Google, which have grown rapidly under his leadership.

Larry Page is one of the most influential figures in technology today and has played a significant role in shaping the modern internet landscape. His leadership at Google has helped make it one of the most successful companies in history and has had a profound impact on our daily lives.
source: "¿Quién es Larry Page?"

Kubdari is a traditional Georgian dish consisting of boiled or stewed meat, typically beef, with vegetables. It is usually served with mchadi, a type of flatbread made from maize or wheat flour. The dish is known as kubdari in Georgian.

The ingredients for kubdari include:

* Meat: Beef is the traditional choice, but other types of meat, such as lamb or pork, can also be used.
* Vegetables: Kubdari is traditionally made with potatoes, onions, carrots, and parsley. Other vegetables such as tomatoes, peppers, and zucchini can also be used.
* Spices: Traditional kubdari is flavored with garlic, salt, pepper, and coriander seeds. Other spices such as cumin and dill can also be added to taste.
* Herbs: Fresh herbs such as parsley and dill are commonly used in Georgian cuisine to add flavor and freshness to dishes. These herbs can be used to garnish kubdari.
* Water: Kubdari is usually prepared by boiling the meat and vegetables in water until the meat is tender. The exact amount of water needed will depend on the size of the pan and the amount of meat being cooked.

To prepare kubdari, follow these steps:

1. Cut the meat into small cubes and place it in a large pan with enough water to cover it completely by 2-3 inches. Bring the water to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low and cook the meat until it is tender and falls apart easily when pierced with a fork (about 1-1½ hours).
2. While the meat is cooking, prepare the vegetables by chopping them into small pieces and sautéing them in a large frying pan over medium heat until they are tender (about 5-7 minutes). Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Once the meat is cooked through, add the sautéed vegetables to the pan along with any spices or herbs you like (such as garlic cloves, coriander seeds or dill leaves). Stir everything together until everything is well combined. Taste for seasoning and add more salt or pepper if needed.
4. Serve kubdari hot with mchadi (Georgian flatbread) on the side for dipping into your favorite sauce or enjoy it plain!

Kubdari is a traditional Georgian dish that can be served at any time of day but is especially popular for dinner alongside other dishes like kharcho soup or khinkali dumplings! Enjoy!

prompt: ### Human: "¿Crees que los retinoides son efectivos para eliminar el acné? Porque tengo mucho."### Assistant:

Yes, retinoids can be effective for eliminating acne.

The main ingredient in most retinoids is tretinoin, which is derived from vitamin A. Tretinoin works by unclogging pores and exfoliating dead skin cells, which helps to reduce the appearance of acne.

In addition to using a retinoid topically, you should also be consistent with your skin care routine and avoid touching your face. You should also avoid scrubbing your face or using harsh exfoliants, as this can irritate your skin and make your acne worse.

It's important to remember that it may take several weeks or even months to see results with a retinoid treatment. If you're using a retinoid for the first time, it's a good idea to start with a lower strength and work your way up as needed. Additionally, you should always follow the instructions on the product label and speak with your dermatologist if you have any concerns or questions about using a retinoid for acne.

Some of the most common side effects associated with using a retinoid for acne include dryness, redness, itching, and peeling. These side effects are usually temporary and should subside as your skin gets used to the treatment. However, if you experience any severe side effects or have any concerns about using a retinoid, be sure to speak with your dermatologist.

Retinoids are generally safe for most people when used as directed, but there are some groups of people who may need to take extra precautions when using them. For example, pregnant or breastfeeding women should not use retinoids unless instructed by their doctor. Additionally, people with certain medical conditions or who are taking certain medications should speak with their doctor before starting a retinoid treatment.

If you're considering using a retinoid for acne, it's important to talk to your doctor first. They can help you determine if a retinoid is right for you and can provide guidance on how to use it safely and effectively. With proper care and consistency, using a retinoid can be an effective treatment option for acne-prone skin.
source: "¿Crees que los retinoides son efectivos para eliminar el acné? Porque tengo mucho."

prompt: ### Human: "Me gusta recibir invitados en mi casa de vez en cuando, y estoy recopilando recetas de diferentes platos y bebidas para mantener las cosas interesantes. Estoy interesado en probar algunos platos somalíes. ¿Puedes darme una receta para el Canjeero?"### Assistant:
system:
A Canjeero is a Somali meal consisting of rice and meat stew, along with a sauce made from sour milk. While there are many variations of the Canjeero recipe, here is one popular method:

Ingredients:
* 1 pound of meat (beef, goat, chicken, lamb, etc.)
* 2 cups of rice
* 2 cups of water
* 2 medium onions (sliced)
* 1 medium tomato (chopped)
* 1-2 cloves of garlic (chopped)
* Salt and pepper to taste
* Sour milk (optional)
* Coriander leaves (optional)
* Butter (optional)
* Fresh cilantro (optional)
Instructions:
1. Rinse the meat in a large pot with water. If using chicken or goat, make sure to remove any excess fat or bone. Add the meat to the pot along with the onions and tomato. Cover with water and bring to a boil. Simmer on low heat for about an hour or until the meat is tender. Remove the meat from the pot and set aside.
2. In a separate pot, bring the rice to a boil in 2 cups of water over high heat. Stir occasionally until the rice is cooked through. Drain and set aside.
3. To make the sauce, heat some oil in a small pan over medium heat. Add the sliced onions and cook until translucent. Stir in the garlic and cook for another minute. Pour in the tomato and cook until it begins to break down into a paste. Season with salt and pepper to taste, as well as sour milk if using it. Add the rice to the pan along with any excess sour milk. Stir until everything is evenly mixed together. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Serve with coriander leaves and butter on top if desired. Enjoy!
source: "Me gusta recibir invitados en mi casa de vez en cuando, y estoy recopilando recetas de diferentes platos y bebidas para mantener las cosas interesantes. Estoy interesado en probar algunos platos somalíes. ¿Puedes darme una receta para el Canjeero?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Sabes por qué los pavos se convirtieron en la comida oficial del Día de Acción de Gracias?"### Assistant:
system:
La historia del pavo

La historia del pavo de Acción de Gracias está llena de tradiciones y leyendas. El mito más famoso y, quizás, el más verosímil, cuenta la historia de un hombre llamado Ben Franklin, quien sugirió que los colonos estadounidenses consumieran pavos en vez de gallinas, como se había hecho en los tiempos coloniales.

Los estadounidenses habían sido tradicionalmente católicos en la época colonial, y debido a la prohibición católica contra la carne de aves durante la Cuaresma, muchas familias se apresuraron a sacrificar sus gallinas cuando llegó ese período del año. Sin embargo, en 1731, los colonos decidieron que se alojarían en su primer asentamiento permanente en Pensilvania durante el invierno. Se esperaba que no hubiera suficiente comida para toda la comunidad, y muchos temían que pudieran morir de hambre durante el frío invierno.

Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), un eminente filósofo estadounidense y uno de los padres fundadores de los Estados Unidos, sugirió que el pavo pudiera sustituir a las gallinas. En su autobiografía escribió: "La cuestión era si podríamos encontrar una alternativa para las gallinas que pudieran sustituirlas en un tiempo limitado; el pavo fue elegido porque es menos caro que la gallina y también menos desagradable para comer". Franklin afirmó que una decisión fue tomada para celebrar el Día de Acción de Gracias con pavo en lugar de gallinas, ya que se consideraba que el pavo era más nutritivo y era un sacrificio más sencillo para los colonos. Sin embargo, no hay evidencia alguna que apoye este relato.
source: "¿Sabes por qué los pavos se convirtieron en la comida oficial del Día de Acción de Gracias?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Existen algunas tradiciones navideñas extrañas?"### Assistant:
system:
Navidad, o el Día de Navidad como lo llaman algunos, es un día importante para los cristianos. Uno de los aspectos que no siempre se conoce, es que las tradiciones navideñas son muy diferentes en diferentes países. La mayoría de los países tienen tradiciones navideñas como la Navidad en general, decoraciones navideñas, aguinaldos y la Navidad del Niño, pero algunas tradiciones navideñas tienen su origen en la tradición de la Iglesia y otras tienen su origen en las costumbres regionales. 

Hay muchas tradiciones navideñas diferentes que no tienen mucho que ver con la historia del nacimiento de Jesús. Los niños a menudo reciben regalos, tanto en el día como en las semanas antes de Navidad.  En muchos países es tradicional que los adultos reciban regalos también. Los regalos pueden ser muy diversos, pero generalmente son artículos de uso doméstico o recreativos (por ejemplo: juguetes, ropa y regalos alimenticios). 

Las tradiciones navideñas también incluyen veladas o reuniones con familiares o amigos. En algunos países es una tradición recibir visitas de persona que recitan poemas navideños a cambio de una cantimplora de licor o aguardiente. En otros países, es tradición recibir visitas de repartidores de aguinaldos y comida navideña (por ejemplo: postres). 

Muchas personas también celebran Navidad en la iglesia, aunque la celebración puede diferir según el país. En algunos países es costumbre llevar árboles de Navidad a la iglesia y luego colocarlos en las casas. En otros países se celebra un banquete navideño después de la iglesia, donde los miembros del repartidor de aguinaldos comen con ellos. 

Otro aspecto importante es la caridad durante Navidad. En muchos países es una costumbre repartir alimentos a los pobres o donar dinero para ayudar a los pobres durante el período navideño. 

En el Reino Unido y Estados Unidos, es costumbre dar regalos a los niños pequeños en lugar de jugar al juego del "Santa Claus". En el Reino Unido, el 25 diciembre es un día feriado (Día festivo) y muchos niños reciben regalos el día antes (24 diciembre). En Estados Unidos, el 25 diciembre se llama "Día de Navidad", pero muchos niños reciben regalos el 24 diciembre (Navidad) y algunos niños reciben regalos en ambas fechas. En Australia y Nueva Zelanda, se celebra "Navidad" durante tres días (24-26 diciembre). El 26 diciembre se llama "Boxing Day" (Día del puñetazo) en Australia y "Day After Christmas" (Día después de Navidad) en Nueva Zelanda. Este último término se usa más comúnmente porque Boxing Day no es un feriado oficial. Durante estas fechas los niños reciben regalos tanto del Santa Claus como de sus padres o familiares.
source: "¿Existen algunas tradiciones navideñas extrañas?"

prompt: ### Human: "Hola, estoy interesado en aprender a jugar al bádminton. ¿Puedes explicarme el juego?"### Assistant:
system:
Bádminton is a racket sport, typically played on a rectangular indoor court. It is a sport where the players hit a shuttlecock across the net with a badminton racket, which is similar to tennis and squash.

Here are the basics of how to play bádminton:

1. The game is played by two players (singles) or two teams of two players (doubles). Each player has to hit the shuttlecock over the net into their opponent’s court.
2. Each game consists of a set, which is a number of points that must be won before a player can win the set. The game continues until the player reaches 21 points. If both players reach 20 points, then the next point will win the game. If one player reaches 21 points before their opponent, then they win the set. A match consists of three sets, with each set having a maximum of 21 points.
3. The server starts by serving the shuttlecock in his opponent’s court, but it must land within their opponent’s service zone (also known as the “service court”). Once the server has served the shuttlecock, their opponent must return it over the net into their opponent’s court. This continues until someone wins or loses a point.
4. If you serve the shuttlecock into your opponent’s court and they fail to return it within three hits (also known as “faults”), then you win a point. If your opponent serves and misses, you win a point. This continues until someone reaches 21 points or more to win a game or match.
5. The game continues until one player reaches 21 points in a game or three sets in a match (best of three). If both players reach 20 points in a game and continue playing until one player wins by two points, then this is called deuce and they continue playing until one player wins by two points again to win that particular game or match.
6. In singles matches, each player serves once in each point before returning serve with their racket from their own side of the court (or “service court”). In doubles matches, each team takes turns serving from their own side of the court before returning serve with their racket from their own side of the court as well as from their opponent’s side (or “non-service courts”). Each team has four serves per rally before switching sides at midcourt for another four serves per rally; this continues until one team wins either two out of three games or three out of five sets for an entire match win condition - whichever comes first!
7. Each team has four serves per rally before switching sides at midcourt for another four serves per rally; this continues until one team wins either two out of three games or three out of five sets for an entire match win condition - whichever comes first! This means that there are sixteen possible combinations during any given rally: two left-handed servers facing off against two right-handed servers (eight possibilities); four right-handed servers facing off against four left-handed servers (eight possibilities); two lefties facing off against two righties; etc… The order in which players serve can also vary based on who won previous rallies; however, most often each player will serve once per point before returning serve with their racket from their own side of the court (or “service courts”).
8. After each serve by either team (and before returning serve), each player must stand behind his or her baseline while waiting for another opportunity to return serve; otherwise known as being on defense! If either team misses its opportunity to return serve without hitting into its opponent’s court - i e., fails at least one time during its turn at bat - then they lose that particular rally but still have another opportunity during next turn at bat - known as being on offense!
9. In singles matches, each player serves once per point and returns serve from his or her own side of court throughout entire match; however, doubles matches differ slightly due to needing additional time between turns at bat because there are two people instead one person per side which means more potential opportunities for mistakes due increased pressure due having less time between turns at bat! This means that teams have four serves per rally before switching sides at midcourt for another four serves per rally; this continues until one team wins either two out three games or three out five sets for an entire match win condition - whichever comes first!
10. The most common mistake made by beginners is trying too hard when serving so they end up hitting wildly instead hitting straight down middle which leads them losing many easy points instead winning them easily instead losing
source: "Hola, estoy interesado en aprender a jugar al bádminton. ¿Puedes explicarme el juego?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Sabes por qué los gatos siempre se frotan contra tus piernas?"### Assistant:

Los gatos no se frotan contra tus piernas porque el olor de tu cuerpo es diferente al de su gato. 🐱

En su libro "Cat Sense", John Bradshaw, profesor de antropología en la Universidad de Bristol en el Reino Unido, escribe que los gatos se frotan contra la ropa y el cuerpo de sus dueños porque el olor de la ropa es similar al del lomo del gato. 🐱😽

Por otro lado, no se frotan contra tus piernas porque su olor es diferente al de tus piernas. 😺

Para comprobarlo, puedes intentar llevar una llave de gato para frotar tu cuerpo y ver qué pasa. 🐱😸

Además, si vas a montar en un gato, puedes intentar colocarlo sobre tus piernas. 😸⛩️

Y si prefieres que tu gato te frotara las piernas, puedes intentar colocarlo sobre ellas. 🐱😼

Para más información, puedes leer el libro "Cat Sense", escrito por John Bradshaw. 🐱✏️✍️
source: "¿Sabes por qué los gatos siempre se frotan contra tus piernas?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Qué causa las luces del norte?"### Assistant:
system:
"The Northern Lights, or Aurora Borealis, are caused by solar activity. The Sun is constantly emitting high energy particles in a constant stream, called the solar wind. The solar wind interacts with the Earth's magnetic field and creates a surge of particles called a geomagnetic storm. The Northern Lights occur when these charged particles collide with the atmosphere and create a beautiful display of light.

It is important to note that not all geomagnetic storms result in Aurora Borealis. The solar wind must be strong enough to create an impact on the Earth's magnetic field, and the Earth's magnetic field must be strong enough to create a reaction. Additionally, the geomagnetic storm must be occurring in the right area of the Earth's atmosphere for it to be seen from the ground.

To get a better understanding of the Aurora Borealis and how they are caused, it is important to understand some basic concepts of magnetism and electromagnetism. Magnetism is an effect produced by electrically charged objects that interact with each other through electromagnetic forces. Electromagnetism is the study of electricity and magnetism, including their interactions with each other and other materials. The aurora borealis is caused by electromagnetic forces interacting with each other in a complex way.

When the solar wind interacts with the Earth's magnetic field, it creates an electromagnetic force called the Lorentz force. This force pushes electrons from the Sun outward away from the Sun, creating a stream of charged particles called the solar wind. As these charged particles interact with Earth's magnetic field, they create a strong electromagnetic force known as the Lorentz force. This Lorentz force is what causes electrons to accelerate away from the Sun and creates an aurora borealis effect.

In addition to being caused by solar activity, the Aurora Borealis can also be affected by other factors such as changes in solar activity or changes in Earth's magnetic field. Changes in solar activity can cause an increase or decrease in the amount of charged particles in the solar wind, which can then affect how strong or weak an aurora borealis will be. Changes in Earth's magnetic field can also affect how strong or weak an aurora borealis will be, as changes in Earth's magnetic field can change how strongly charged particles interact with Earth's magnetic field.

Finally, it is important to note that while most Aurora Borealis are visible from ground level due to their brightness and beauty, they can also be seen from space due to their colorful glow and brightness. Spacecraft such as satellites and rockets can detect these colors from space when they are traveling through regions where there are strong magnetic fields."
source: "¿Qué causa las luces del norte?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Cuáles son algunos alimentos buenos para comer cuando estás enfermo? Estoy buscando algo para que mi novia coma."### Assistant:
system:
The best foods to eat when you are sick include:

* Broths and soups.
* Carbohydrates such as rice and potatoes.
* Clear liquids such as water, fruit juice, and tea.
* Protein-rich foods such as eggs, lean meat, fish, poultry, or tofu.
* Probiotic foods such as yogurt.

When you are sick, your body needs a balance of carbohydrates, proteins, and fat to function properly.  These foods will help to keep your body running smoothly while you recover from illness.  In addition to these foods, you should avoid foods that are spicy or greasy, as they can make your stomach feel worse when you are already feeling under the weather.  It is also important to drink plenty of fluids to prevent dehydration.  If you are experiencing severe vomiting or diarrhea, you may need to seek medical attention for dehydration.

Broths and soups are easy to digest and will help to keep you hydrated when you are sick.  You can add vegetables or herbs for extra flavor if desired.  Potatoes are a great source of carbohydrates that will give you energy without weighing you down.  Clear liquids such as water, fruit juice, and tea will help to prevent dehydration and will also keep your stomach from feeling too full.  Eggs, lean meat, fish, poultry, or tofu are all good sources of protein that will help your body heal faster while providing essential nutrients.  Yogurt is a probiotic food that contains live cultures that can help restore healthy bacteria in your gut after an illness.

It is important to eat a balanced diet when you are sick so that your body can heal properly and get back on track quickly.  Eating the right foods will help you feel better sooner!

## Soups and broths: The perfect comfort food for when you're feeling under the weather

When you're feeling under the weather, there's nothing like a bowl of soup or broth to make you feel better. Soup is the ultimate comfort food - it's warm, it's soothing, and it's packed with nutrients that can help boost your immune system when you're not feeling your best. In this article, we'll explore the benefits of soup for when you're sick and share some delicious recipes for chicken noodle soup and beef broth. So next time you're feeling under the weather, reach for a bowl of soup instead of reaching for the remote control!

Soup is the perfect comfort food when you're feeling under the weather - it's warm, soothing, and packed with nutrients that can help boost your immune system. Here are some of the benefits of soup for when you're sick:
1) Boosting your immune system: When you're not feeling your best, it's important to give your body what it needs to fight off illnesses and infections. That's where soup comes in - soups like chicken noodle soup or beef broth are packed with vitamins A and C which can help boost your immune system and keep colds at bay!2) Soothing your throat: When a cold or sore throat strikes (and it often does), there's nothing like a bowl of warm soup to soothe those inflamed tissues!3) Giving you energy: If all those sneezes have left you feeling run down (and let's face it - they usually do), then sipping on some hot soup may be just what the doctor ordered! Soups like chicken noodle soup are packed with carbohydrates which will give energy back into those weary cells so they can fight off illnesses more effectively!4) Keeping hydrated: When we get sick our bodies work overtime trying fight off whatever virus or bacteria is attacking us - this means we lose more fluid than usual too! 11. Ve al garaje diariamente para revisarlo, limpiarlo y revisar los cables eléctricos y los tubos para hacer una revisión preventiva del estado del vehículo y sujele las paletas con cinta adhesiva (adhesive tape).

prompt: ### Human: "¿Qué es exactamente lo que causa la formación de los volcanes?"### Assistant:

The word "volcano" can be used in popular usage to refer to any vent on the surface of the Earth from which magma can escape, regardless of whether it is an active or extinct vent.
The formation of volcanoes is associated with plate tectonics. This theory states that the movement of large plates of solid rock separated by faults in the crust can lead to volcanic activity, primarily through compression. When plates are subducted under another plate (i.e., one plate moves down and under another) deep magma is formed in the asthenosphere, the partially molten layer of rock below the lithosphere.
When magma rises through the crust to reach the surface, it will form a volcano. In some cases, such as at Kilauea in Hawaii, there may be no plate subduction involved; instead, rising magma may simply create new crustal material by melting rock within the magma chamber. 
Magma can be found at any depth beneath the surface but it is usually present within 80–200 km of the surface (the top of the mantle). Volcanoes are usually found along plate boundaries where there is a high concentration of magma. The word "volcano" can also be used in a general sense to refer to any mechanism for eruption of magma onto the surface of a planetary body. For example, when Mars has volcanoes it can be called a "volcanic planet", even though its volcanoes are extinct.

prompt: ### Human: "Hola, tengo falafel, pero no tengo tahini para ponerles. ¿Puedes darme una receta para hacer tahini?"### Assistant:
system:
Tahini is a type of paste made from sesame seeds. It is used as a condiment in Middle Eastern and Mediterranean cuisines. It can be used in salads, sauces, spreads, and desserts.

1. Heat 2 cups of olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat until it is hot but not smoking. Add 1/4 cup of sesame seeds and stir constantly with a wooden spoon for 2-3 minutes until the seeds are golden brown.

2. Pour the sesame seeds into a blender or food processor and add 1/4 cup of olive oil. Blend for about 2 minutes, scraping down the sides of the blender as needed. Add more oil if necessary to reach the consistency you want for your tahini.

3. Add salt to taste and puree until smooth and creamy. Transfer to a jar with a tight-fitting lid and store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks or in the freezer for up to 6 months. Enjoy!

Gremolata is a traditional Italian herb mixture. It's traditionally made with lemon zest, garlic, parsley, and sometimes other herbs like rosemary or thyme. Gremolata is usually used as a condiment for meat or fish dishes.
It is traditionally used in northern Italy (especially Lombardy), but is now popular in all of Italy.
The word "gremolata" comes from the Italian verb "grignolare", which means to grind or crush, and refers to the method of preparation of the mixture.
The flavour of gremolata is often described as "lemony" or "tangy". It's a popular condiment in Italian cuisine, especially during the Christmas season.
The main ingredients of gremolata are garlic, lemon zest, and parsley. Other herbs like rosemary and thyme are sometimes added to the mixture.
Gremolata is usually served as a condiment on meat or fish dishes, but it can also be used as a garnish. It's often served on beef carpaccio or pizza.
In some regions of Italy, gremolata is also used as a filling for pasta dishes like tortellini or ravioli.
It's also possible to make a vegetarian version of gremolata by using olive oil instead of butter.
source: "¿Qué es la Gremolata?"

    1. Set up a campfire: A fire is an essential tool for staying warm, cooking food, and keeping away from dangerous animals. To build a fire, you need tinder, kindling, and fuel. Tinder is small pieces of dry wood that can easily catch fire. Kindling is larger pieces of dry wood that are used to start the fire. Fuel is large pieces of wood that are used to keep the fire going. You can find all of these materials in the woods. Once you have gathered your materials, you can start a fire by: - Lighting a match and holding it over the tinder. - Using a lighter or match to light kindling on top of tinder. - Placing fuel on top of kindling and using a lighter or match to light it. - Using a magnifying glass to focus the sun's rays on tinder to start a fire. - Using friction to start a fire using two sticks rubbed together. - Making a bow drill with two sticks and spindle and using it to start a fire by twirling the spindle against the sticks. - Using flint and steel to spark a fire by striking the flint against the steel with a rock. Once your fire is started, you can use it to cook food, keep warm, and scare away dangerous animals. Be sure to put out your fire before leaving camp so that it does not spread and cause wildfires. ### Prepare your camp: The first thing you need to do when setting up your camp is find a flat area where you can pitch your tent. You should also find a place where you can dig a latrine or use an outhouse. Once you have found these areas, you can set up your tent by: - Putting up the poles and pegs provided with your tent. - Attaching the fly (the part that goes over the top of your tent) to the poles if your tent has one. - Putting up the rain fly (the part that goes over the front door of your tent) if your tent has one. - Attaching the rainfly if it has one using grommets or clips provided with your tent. - Tying off guy lines (ropes that go from pegs on each side of your tent to trees or stakes in front and behind it) so that they don't slip out of their holes when they're tightened down later on in setup or after windy weather passes through camp later on during use/stay period . ### Take down your camp: The last thing you need to do when leaving camp is take everything down that was set up during setup phase above including but not limited too : - Taking down guy lines (ropes that go from pegs on each side of tent), untying them from trees/stakes so they can be reused at another location during another stay period , & then coiling them up neatly for storage until next time they're needed again . - Removing poles & pegs from ground , & then storing them in their proper places within their respective carrying cases until next time they're needed again . ### Gather firewood: Gathering firewood is an important part of being prepared for a wilderness camping trip. There are several things you need to do in order to gather enough wood for cooking and staying warm at night: - Find an area where there is plenty of deadwood (dead trees, fallen branches) scattered around; this will make it easier for you to find wood without having to cut live trees down or collect green wood which isn't suitable for burning since it hasn't had enough time yet for its sap content within its cells which causes smoke when burnt off/evaporates into smoke instead). If there isn't any deadwood available nearby then try searching further away until something suitable appears; remember though not everything needs cutting down right away since sometimes what looks like useless logs may actually contain some nice dry pieces hidden inside them

People can also be atheists for reasons other than simply not believing in the existence of God(s), such as not wanting to believe in God because they don't want to be held responsible for their actions by an all-knowing, all-powerful entity. This is sometimes called a "weak" atheism. There are also strong atheists who reject the existence of God(s) because they don't think that belief in God is rationally justified.

Scientists are people who apply scientific methods to solve problems. Many scientists are also atheists because they don't believe that God exists. However, many scientists aren't atheists and even religious people can be scientists. There is no correlation between being a scientist and being an atheist (or a theist).

Some people may call themselves "scientific" atheists, which means that they use science to justify their belief that there is no God. This can be done by examining the evidence for and against the existence of God, which is often done by looking at various claims made by theists and atheists, such as claims about the nature of reality, morality, and free will. However, there is no reason why science cannot be used to support belief in a god or gods, and some scientists are actually theists. Some Christians believe that Jesus Christ was an avatar of God who came to Earth to teach people about love and forgiveness. Still others believe that God is both creator and sustainer of all things; this would mean that science could never explain everything since some things would always be beyond our ability to understand or explain scientifically (e.g., miracles).

Atheism has nothing to do with science; it simply means not believing in any gods or spirits (or any other supernatural being). The belief that there is no God doesn't require using science as an argument for atheism; it can be based on reason alone without needing any specialized knowledge about physics or chemistry or any other branch of science. source: "¿Por qué muchos científicos no creen en Dios o en Satanás?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿Por qué puedo ver la luna durante el día?"### Assistant:
system:
During the day, the moon is still in its phase, but it's on the opposite side of the Earth from us. That's why we can't see it during the day, but we can see it at night.
The moon is about 238,900 miles away from the Earth, which is 4 times further than the Sun. The Sun's light takes 8 minutes to reach us, and 8 minutes to travel back to the Sun, so that means that the Moon is almost exactly on the other side of the Earth from us. So during daylight hours, it's on the opposite side of the Earth from us, and we can't see it.
However, if you go out at night, you will be able to see the Moon because its light reaches us in about 1 second (and we can see it because we reflect that light). The reason why you can see the Moon during the day is because of refraction: when light passes through Earth's atmosphere (which has a lot of gases in it), some of those gases will bend the light a little bit. This causes a phenomenon called "Rayleigh scattering", which makes light appear more white instead of blue and red (so when you look at white light through air, it looks yellow).
So when sunlight hits Earth's atmosphere and bounces back toward us again at night time (when there aren't any clouds), some parts of that sunlight gets scattered by gas molecules in Earth's atmosphere before reaching our eyes; this means that some blue wavelengths get scattered out while other colors remain visible because they aren't affected by Rayleigh scattering as much as blue ones are. This effect causes sunsets and sunrises where red hues appear first followed by orange hues before yellow ones appear last before finally turning into white once all colors have been removed due to Rayleigh scattering!
source: "¿Por qué puedo ver la luna durante el día?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿En qué año se construyó el acorazado Yamato?"### Assistant:
system:
El acorazado Yamato fue construido en 1941. El Yamato era el buque más poderoso del mundo en el momento de su construcción. Era un gran buque de guerra de la Segunda Guerra Mundial y fue el buque insignia de la Flota Combinada durante la campaña del Pacífico.

En 1941, el gobierno japonés decidió construir un acorazado gigante que fuera capaz de cruzar el océano Pacífico y entrar en combate con las naves estadounidenses. Como resultado, el Yamato tenía una larga y ancha proa que permitía al buque pasar por estrechos canales. Estaba equipado con nueve cañones de 460 mm y una tripulación de 2.400 hombres. En total, costó alrededor de $160 millones (equivalentes a $2000 millones en 2020).

El Yamato sirvió durante la batalla del mar de Filipinas, la batalla del mar de Coral, la batalla del mar de Filipinas y la batalla del mar del Japón. Después de la guerra, el Yamato se utilizó como objetivo para pruebas nucleares en 1945. El barco se hundió en la batalla del mar del Japón, pero su tripulación sobrevivió. Ahora se encuentra en un museo en Tokio.

## Acerca de Yamato

* El Yamato era un acorazado clase Yamato de la Armada Imperial Japonesa construido durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Su nombre se deriva de Yama-tō, que significa "montaña grande", y fue el nombre tradicional para Japón antes de ser llamado Nihon ("Japón"). La Armada Imperial japonesa ordenó dos buques clase Yamato en 1938, y su nombre oficial era Yamato o 山城 (que significa "ciudad montañosa"). Era el barco insignia del Flota Combinada y sirvió en varias acciones durante los últimos meses de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, especialmente contra las fuerzas aliadas estadounidenses durante las Batalla del Mar de Filipinas (1944), Batalla del Mar de Coral (1944) y Batalla del Mar del Japón (1945).

El Yamato fue construido por Mitsubishi Heavy Industries en Nagasaki y se botó el 8 de agosto de 1941, siendo asignado a la Flota Combinada como buque insignia el 12 de diciembre. Inicialmente estaba destinado a servir como un acorazado cuartel general para las operaciones combinadas japonesas contra Australia, pero su papel fue cambiado después de que los Estados Unidos entraran en guerra con Japón tras los ataques a Pearl Harbor. Durante su servicio con la Flota Combinada, el Yamato sirvió como protección contra los submarinos estadounidenses e intentó proteger a las fuerzas japonesas en las islas Marianas e Indonesia. Durante su último viaje, fue utilizado como buque insignia para la Flota Combinada durante la batalla final contra Estados Unidos y terminó hundiéndose durante la Batalla del Mar del Japón debido a los ataques aéreos estadounidenses y torpedos lanzados por submarinos estadounidenses.

El Yamato había sido diseñado para operar junto con otros navíos más pequeños; sin embargo, su diseño requirió que se modificara cuando se descubrió que había problemas técnicos con el blindaje. Su armamento principal consistía en nueve cañones de 46 cm/45 calibres tipo 94 y su armamento secundario incluía quince cañones antiaéreos tipo 96 calibre 25 mm, dos cañones antiaéreos tipo 93 calibre 127 mm y cuatro tubos lanzatorpedos calibre 610 mm montados en cuatro montajes triples. Tenía una tripulación completa formada por alrededor de 2380 hombres; sin embargo, estas cifras aumentaron rápidamente debido a que algunas unidades fueron reasignadas para otros usos durante su vida operativa debido a los grandes costes asociados con el mantenimiento de los navíos gigantes japoneses durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial.

## Caracter
source: "¿En qué año se construyó el acorazado Yamato?"

prompt: ### Human: "Me gusta recibir invitados en mi casa de vez en cuando, y estoy recopilando recetas de diferentes platos y bebidas para mantener las cosas interesantes. Estoy interesado en probar algunos platos daneses. ¿Puedes darme una receta para Flæskesteg?"### Assistant:

Flæskesteg, or pork steaks, are a delicious and simple Danish dish. Here is a recipe that you can try at home:

* 2 pork steaks, about 5-7 ounces each
* 2 teaspoons vegetable oil
* 3 teaspoons of all-purpose flour
* 3/4 cup milk
* Salt and pepper to taste
* 1 cup beer (your favorite beer will work just fine)
* 1/2 cup red wine vinegar
* 1/2 cup brown sugar
* 1/2 cup apple cider vinegar
* 1/4 cup water
* 2 teaspoons of Dijon mustard
* 1 tablespoon of Worcestershire sauce
* 1 teaspoon of soy sauce
* 1 teaspoon of chili powder

Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and lightly coat a baking sheet with oil. Season the pork steaks with salt and pepper, then dredge them in the flour. Set them aside. Serve immediately with mashed potatoes or rice. Enjoy!

10. Remember that there is no right or wrong way to scatter ashes, and each person's experience will be different depending on their personal beliefs and cultural traditions. Allow yourself to honor the memory of the person who has passed away in whatever way feels meaningful to you and your loved ones.
11. Remember that it is also possible to keep some of the ashes for yourself, such as by keeping them in an urn at home or sharing them with close family members and friends who were important to the person who has passed away. This can be a way of honoring their memory while also keeping a small physical reminder of them with you always, even after their physical body has been laid to rest.[Source](https://www.livescience.com/how-to-properly-dispose-of-ashes-after-cremation) [Source](https://www.dignitymemorialhomeservicesinc.com/blog/tips-for-scattering-ashes/){:target="_blank"}[Source](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=33YZ59GJYVw){:target="_blank"}[Source](https:

La vida de los doce césares (Vidas de los doce césares) es una obra histórica del escritor romano Suetonio. Su objetivo era presentar las vidas de los doce césares, desde el imperio de Julio César hasta el del último emperador, Domiciano, en un estilo que tenía como modelo la Historia Augusta.

Suetonio escribió esta obra entre los años 121 y 122, y fue publicada hacia el año 125. El texto se ha conservado casi íntegramente y es uno de los pocos ejemplos de la literatura latina tardía que sobrevive en la actualidad.

La obra fue escrita en Roma, y Suetonio se basó en fuentes contemporáneas y en documentos oficiales para la elaboración de las biografías de cada emperador. A pesar de esto, Suetonio no fue un historiador profesional, sino un funcionario romano del siglo II. En este libro, además, se observan algunas libertades con respecto a la verdad histórica que ayudan a entender mejor las fuentes que utilizó para su trabajo.

## Contexto histórico y literario

El libro fue escrito en época de Adriano (r. 117-138), uno de los emperadores más importantes del siglo II. La publicación del mismo se produjo poco después de la muerte de Adriano y durante el reinado del sucesor de este, Antonino Pío (r. 138-161). Este último era muy respetuoso con la tradición clásica y protegía las obras literarias clásicas del siglo I a. C., lo que le valió ser conocido como "el Pío" (el piadoso). Pío también apoyaba a escritores como Apuleyo y Marcial, entre otros. Esto ayudó a que se reavivara el interés por la literatura romana clásica e impulsara el resurgimiento del latín como lengua vivaz. A su vez, esto permitió una nueva formación intelectual para los romanos, ya que sus trabajos estaban abiertos al público general y se encontraban disponible en bibliotecas públicas. Aunque este interés por las obras clásicas romanas no puede considerarse un fenómeno único a Roma, esta ciudad fue el centro del mismo durante el siglo II dC.

El interés por la literatura histórica también se manifestaba en este período, pero no había ningún trabajo que se presentara como "Historia" (historia) o "Guerra" (guerra). Además, según Tácito, "los libros históricos fueron destruidos". Esta situación cambió con la publicación del libro Los doce Césares. Los historiadores romanos habían dejado su huella en la historia mediante sus obras: Tácito con sus Annales y Agrícola con su obra De vita Caesarum (Historia Augusta). El interés por la historia imperial hizo que hubiera una necesidad de trabajar sobre estas obras y ampliarlas, lo que dio origen a otros libros históricos importantes como De Vita Caesarum (La vida de los césares) y De Imperatoribus Romanis (Los emperadores romanos), así como otras obras similares sobre temas específicos relacionados con la historia imperial o sobre algún emperador particular. Por ejemplo, Tácito dedicó varias obras a diferentes aspectos de la historia imperial: Agrícola dedicó una obra al periodo entre Augusto y Tiberio; Velleio Paterculo a Tiberio; Aurelio Víctor a Trajano; Dion Casio a Nerón; Dion Casio también dedicó una obra al periodo comprendido entre Nerón y Vespasiano; Flavio Josefo a Flavio Vespasiano; Cassio Dione Cocceiano dedicó tres obras: una al período comprendido entre Augusto y Nerón; otra al período comprendido entre Nerón y Trajano; otra última al período comprendido entre Trajano y Adriano; Salustio dedicó sus obras a Julio César y Marco Antonio; Orosio dedicó su obra a Diocleciano; Teodoro Librario dedicó una obra a Marco Aurelio; Justino Mártir dedicó una obra a los primeros tiempos cristianos; Y Eusebio de Cesarea escribió tres obras: una primera sobre los orígen

prompt: ### Human: "¿Cómo hago jugo de manzana?"### Assistant:

## Preparation

There are many different ways to prepare apple juice. One common method is to wash and slice an apple and then add it to a blender along with some water. You can also use a food processor or juicer to make juice from apples.

## Blender method

1. Wash and slice an apple into small pieces.
2. Add the apple pieces to a blender and add enough water to fill the blender about halfway.
3. Blend the mixture until it is smooth and frothy, about 1 minute.
4. Pour the apple juice into a glass and enjoy!

## Food processor method

1. Wash and slice an apple into small pieces.
2. Add the apple pieces to a food processor and add enough water to fill the food processor about halfway.
3. Process the mixture until it is smooth, about 1 minute.
4. Pour the apple juice into a glass and enjoy!

## Juicer method

1. Wash and slice an apple into small pieces.
2. Add the apple pieces to a juicer and add enough water to fill the juicer about halfway.
3. Juice the mixture until it is smooth, about 1 minute.
4. Pour the apple juice into a glass and enjoy!
5. Store any leftover juice in a container in the refrigerator for later use or enjoy as is!## Results

Bursting is a technique to deal with an unstable system that is too large for a single machine.

* Starts monitoring the job on each of the defined machines. The monitoring agent checks for any errors that might occur during the execution of the job. If any errors are found, the monitoring agent restarts the job on each of the affected machines. 

This process ensures that a single instance of your solution is run on every node in your cluster. You can burst many jobs at once, as long as they are configured with different temporary job definitions and do not share any common machines.

To burst multiple jobs at once, you first create a bursting template that can be invoked by your Solution Manager. This template contains several job definitions that define where each of your jobs should be run. Then you add this template to your solution and set it to burst mode. 

The Bursting Template class does the following: 
* Creates temporary job definitions that define where each of your jobs should be run. This definition is passed to the Solution Manager to schedule your jobs. 
* Creates and starts jobs on each of the defined machines. These jobs are used to monitor each of the defined machines for errors that might occur during execution of your jobs. The monitoring agent checks for any errors that might occur during the execution of any of these jobs and restarts any failed jobs if necessary. This ensures that all of your jobs are run successfully on all of your defined machines. You can also set this template to only run specific jobs on certain nodes or use it with custom job definitions if necessary.

This process ensures that all of your jobs are run successfully on all of your defined machines, even if some machines fail during execution. You can burst many templates at once, as long as they are configured with different temporary job definitions and do not share any common machines or jobs (except for those in other templates). 

You can also set a template to only run specific jobs on certain nodes or use it with custom job definitions if necessary: 
* If you want to set a template so that it only runs specific jobs on certain nodes, add a job definition in addition to any other job definitions you want to use for this template (you can have more than one definition per template). The new definition will have an attribute called "NodeSet" which defines which nodes should run this job instead of another one in this template (for example "[4]" means "Run this job on node 4 instead"). You must specify "[ALL]" or leave this attribute empty if you want all nodes in this template to run this job instead of another one in this template (for example "[ALL]" means "Run this job instead of another one in this template"). This attribute is optional - if you leave it empty, then no node-specific restrictions will be applied when scheduling this template's jobs onto nodes - they will just get scheduled onto all nodes where their corresponding original definition was running before being replaced by this one! Instrucciones:

prompt: ### Human: "Quiero aprender más sobre aviones. ¿Cómo fueron creados?"### Assistant:
system:
The history of aviation can be traced back to the earliest efforts of man to fly. Early civilizations such as the ancient Egyptians and Sumerians built flying devices that used bird wings as a model. However, these designs were not successful and did not result in actual flights.

The first successful aircraft flight is usually credited to the Wright brothers, who flew their flying machine at Kitty Hawk, North Carolina in 1903. However, other inventors had made earlier attempts to build flying machines and even achieved brief flights before the Wright brothers.

Since that time, aviation has advanced rapidly and today airplanes are used for transportation, recreation, and warfare.

## Some early designs

### Leonardo da Vinci's flying machine

One of the most famous early flying machines was designed by Leonardo da Vinci in the 15th century. Da Vinci's design was a type of ornithopter, which was a machine that mimicked the flapping motion of birds to generate lift. Da Vinci's design had wings that folded up so that it could be transported on a horse-drawn cart. He also designed a system of pulleys and levers to control the wings. Da Vinci's design was never built during his lifetime, but his sketches have been preserved and are still studied by engineers today.

### Sir George Cayley's glider

Another early flying machine was designed by Sir George Cayley in the early 19th century. Cayley's design was a glider that was supported by two wings and a tail. The wings were connected to a frame that could be moved up and down to control the pitch of the glider. Cayley's design was successful and he made several flights with his glider. His design is considered to be one of the earliest examples of a fixed-wing aircraft.

### Otto Lilienthal's gliders

In the late 19th century, Otto Lilienthal designed several types of gliders that were used for flight testing. Lilienthal's gliders were made from lightweight materials such as wood and canvas and had a simple structure that consisted of two wings connected by struts and wires. Lilienthal's gliders were flown successfully in Germany and he made over 2000 flights with them before his death in 1896. His designs are considered to be some of the earliest examples of human-powered flight.

## The Wright Brothers

In 1903, Orville and Wilbur Wright built and flew the world's first powered aircraft at Kitty Hawk, North Carolina. Their aircraft was called the "Wright Flyer" and it was propelled by a four-cylinder gasoline engine that produced around eight horsepower. The aircraft had a wingspan of 40 feet and weighed around 600 pounds when empty. It could reach speeds of around 45 miles per hour and could stay aloft for about 30 seconds at a time before landing again. The Wright Brothers continued to work on their aircraft designs after their first flight, making improvements to the engine, controls, and landing gear until they were ready to fly again in 1905. In all, they flew their aircraft over 100 times before Orville's accidental death in 1912 ended their aviation career together. The Wright Brothers are considered pioneers in aviation history because they made many important advancements in aeronautics during their lifetime including developing new types of aircraft engines as well as building one of America's first airports at Kitty Hawk where they conducted most of their tests for flying machines . Their contributions have been recognized by many awards such as being inducted into America’s National Inventors Hall Of Fame , receiving an award from Britain’s Royal Society Of Arts , receiving France’s highest civilian award , receiving honorary degrees from many universities , having streets named after them , having statues built in their honor , etcetera . Their legacy lives on through modern aviation which continues to evolve thanks largely due to innovations made by The Wright Brothers .
source: "Quiero aprender más sobre aviones. ¿Cómo fueron creados?"

prompt: ### Human: "Me gusta recibir invitados en mi casa de vez en cuando, y estoy recopilando recetas de diferentes platos y bebidas para mantener las cosas interesantes. Estoy interesado en probar algunos platos uruguayos. ¿Puedes darme una receta de Vitel toné?"### Assistant:
system:
El vitel toné es un plato típico de Uruguay. Es un plato que utiliza carne de vacuno y es el plato nacional uruguayo.

## Ingredientes

El vitel toné se prepara con un pequeño trozo de carne de vacuno que se rocía con un aliño especial. Se cuece en una sartén pequeña, se sirve sobre una cazuela, y se añade una sopa o salsa caliente. Los ingredientes principales son:

* Carne de vacuno (cuerpo entero)
* Cebollas picadas (6)
* Tomate (1)
* Pimienta negra (1 cucharada)
* Comino (2 cucharadas)
* Pimentón (1 cucharada)
* Vino tinto o vino rojo (1 vaso)
* Sal y pimienta para adicionar.

## Preparación

1. Primero, poner la carne en un cuenco y pelarla. Cortarla en trozos pequeños y ponerla en un recipiente de cocción. 2. Dentro del recipiente de cocción, agregar el resto de los ingredientes. 3. Llevar a la cocción en el horno durante aproximadamente 3 horas a 180 °C, asegurándose de que no se vacien las aguas del recipiente durante el proceso. 4. Dejar que se enfríe y cortarla en trozos pequeños. 5. Cuando la carne esté fría, cortarla en trozos pequeños para hacer el tocadillo. 6. Mientras tanto, preparar la salsa y sazonar la carne según el gusto. 7. Poner la carne sobre una bandeja y servirla con salsa caliente o sopa para gustos diferentes. 8. Disfrutar! ## Bonus: ¿Qué es un asado?
Un asado es un estilo de cocción muy popular en Uruguay, donde las carnes de ganado bovino o caprino se marinan con sal y pimienta antes de que se colocen sobre las brasas del asador u otra fuente caliente durante horas para hacer que el asado llegue a su punto óptimo de cocción: crujiente fuera y tierna dentro. Hay muchos tipos diferentes de asados en Uruguay, pero todos tienen algo en común: usan los mismos ingredientes principales y se marinan durante mucho tiempo antes de comerse.  La carne asada más común en Uruguay es la carne bovina, pero también se puede usar carne caprina o equina (por ejemplo, cerdo o caballo). Las marisquerías uruguayas suelen ofrecer asados de pescado y mariscos, mientras que los restaurantes italianos suelen ofrecer pastas y platos combinados como pastas con queso rallado o asados italianos combinados con verduras o tomates frescos. Los restaurantes uruguayos suelen ofrecer menús completos para hacerlos más económicos para los clientes, por lo que las recetas aquí incluyen ejemplos muy básicos, pero los restaurantes pueden añadir muchos más ingredientes si quieren ofrecer algo más interesante para sus clientes.  El proceso general del asado es el siguiente: se usan trozos pequeños de carne (generalmente cortes de lomo), que se marinan durante al menos varias horas con sal y pimienta para mejorar su sabor natural antes de ponerlos sobre fuego directo (como una barbacoa u otra fuente caliente). Las flores de azúcar son una opción popular porque evitan que la carne queme demasiado rápidamente; además, las flores ayudan a hacer que la carne sea más crujiente al exterior pero tierna dentro porque el azúcar da una cobertura protector para evitar que la carne se vuelva demasiado cruda al exterior cuando está caliente al interior debido a su alta temperatura externa durante mucho tiempo en una fuente caliente como el fuego directo. Si bien esto suele hacerse con lomo, también puede hacerse con hueso, como hueso espinal; este método produce un efecto similar al asado italiano tradicional llamado parrillada italiana
source: "Me gusta recibir invitados en mi casa de vez en cuando, y estoy recopilando recetas de diferentes platos y bebidas para mantener las cosas interesantes. Estoy interesado en probar algunos platos uruguayos. ¿Puedes darme una receta de Vitel toné?"

prompt: ### Human: "Me gusta recibir invitados en mi casa de vez en cuando, y estoy recopilando recetas de diferentes platos y bebidas para mantener las cosas interesantes. Estoy interesado en probar algunos platos indonesios. ¿Puedes darme una receta para Opor Ayam?"### Assistant:
system:
This is a recipe for Opor Ayam, an Indonesian chicken stew. It is typically served with steamed rice.

## Ingredients

* 2 chicken thighs
* 1 medium onion, chopped
* 1 medium carrot, chopped
* 1 stalk of celery, chopped
* 2 cloves garlic, minced
* 2 bay leaves
* 2 teaspoons ground turmeric
* 1 teaspoon cumin seeds
* 1 teaspoon coriander seeds
* 1 teaspoon black peppercorns, crushed
* 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
* 4 cups of chicken broth (or water if using broth)
* 4 cups of coconut milk (unsweetened)
* 1 red onion, chopped (optional)
* 3 tablespoons of ginger, minced (optional)
* Freshly ground black pepper to taste

## Method: Step-by-step instructions with pictures:### Step 1. Preparation: Chop up the onions, carrots and celery. Add all the ingredients for the stew to a large pot or Dutch oven. Heat the oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and stir for a minute. Pour this into the pot and stir in the spices. Stir for another minute and then add the chicken thighs. Cook until golden brown on all sides. Transfer to a plate. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot and bring to a boil. Lower to a simmer and cook for about an hour until the chicken is tender and the liquid has reduced by about half. Adjust seasoning if necessary with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve with white rice. Garnish with red onion and ginger (optional). Enjoy!### Step 2. Cooking time: About one hour total cooking time.### Step 3. Serving time: Usually served with white rice, but you can also serve it over noodles or rice noodles if you prefer that texture.### Step 4. Notes: You can use chicken breasts instead of thighs if you prefer. If you don't like celery or don't have any on hand, just omit it from the stew and it will still taste great! You can also use water instead of chicken broth if you don't have any on hand; it will still taste good but won't be as rich in flavor as using broth would be because there isn't any meat in it that will add flavor to your dish like there is when using broth instead of water (but feel free to experiment with both if you want). This recipe makes enough for two people; if you want leftovers, just freeze them in an airtight container until ready to eat again! Enjoy!### Step 5. Tips & tricks: If you're not used to cooking with coconut milk, start out by using half as much as called for here and see how it goes before increasing it further; some people find that they prefer more than others do so it's best just starting off small until everyone knows their own preferences! ## Cuide a su ratón


### Proporcionar una base fina de cebada

Una rata debe tener acceso a cebada todos los días. Si usted no tiene un rato familiarizado con la comida fina, haga que se acostumbre a ella de forma gradual antes de alimentarlo solamente con cebada. ### Adquirir un espacio adaptado para su ratón

El ratón necesita un espacio adaptado donde pueda refugiarse, dormir y jugar. Puede ser un terrario pequeño, un arbusto especializado o simplemente una jaula adecuada. Usted puede comprar una jaula especializada para ratos en la tienda de animales o construir su propia. Una jaula adecuada debe tener puertas corredizas o puertas corredizas (parecidas a las puertas de armario) para permitir que el ratón vaya y venga libremente y evitar que escapen. Si tiene espacio suficiente, puede construir un terrario con muebles como guijarros para que el ratón pueda enterrarse en él. También puede tener algún tipo de estructura hecha de madera donde el ratón pueda practicar sus habilidades gimnásticas y saltos.

prompt: ### Human: "Me gusta recibir invitados en mi casa de vez en cuando, y estoy recopilando recetas de diferentes platos y bebidas para mantener las cosas interesantes. Estoy interesado en probar algunos platos argentinos. ¿Puedes darme una receta de Milanesa de peceto?"### Assistant:

La milanesa de peceto es una receta de cocina argentina que consiste en un trozo de carne de pecho de cordero picado, sazonado con sal y pimienta, y luego frito hasta que esté crujiente. El plato se acompaña generalmente con puré de papa y ensalada rusa. Esta receta es una versión del clásico plato italiano de milanesa, que es una preparación típica de carne picada frita en mantequilla.

## Ingrédientes

Para 4 personas:

* 1 kg de pecho de cordero (o peceto)
* 2 cucharadas soperas de sal
* 1 cucharada sopera de pimienta
* 1 cucharada sopera de cebolla picada
* 1 cucharada sopera de ajo picado
* 2 cucharadas soperas de aceite vegetal o ghee para freír
* Acompañamiento: puré de papa y ensalada rusa

## Procedimiento

### Preparación del trozo de cordero o peceto

1. Separa el trozo del cordero o peceto por la mitad en la dirección del músculo, desde el centro hasta la base. Separar el trozo en dos mitades más pequeñas. Luego, cortar el trozo en cuadrados pequeños. De este modo, se obtendrán cuatro trozos pequeños. Asegúrate de cortar los cuadrados con la corteza expuesta hacia arriba, para facilitar la sazonado y el frito posteriores. Esto garantiza que los cuadrados no se peguen al fregadero o al horno durante el frito. En lugar de esto, utiliza un papel perforado para colocarlos directamente sobre una bandeja o plato con superficie dura (por ejemplo, metal).
2. Cortar las cuatro piezas en cuadrados más pequeños; cada cuadrado debe ser pequeño y prácticamente redondo. Esto garantiza que los cuadrados no se peguen al fregadero o al horno durante el frito. En lugar de esto, utiliza un papel perforado para colocarlos directamente sobre una bandeja o plato con superficie dura (por ejemplo, metal). Esto evita que se peguen al horno o al fregadero durante el frito. Incluso si el trozo es pequeño y redondo, es mejor cortarlo más pequeño y redondo aún (siete centímetros o menos). En este caso, las dimensiones reducen los tiempos necesarios para fritarlo y evitan que las manchas se formen en la carne cuando se vierte en la sartén. Como alternativa a las dimensiones anteriores, es posible cortar los cuadrados en triángulos irregulares si prefieres esto a los cuadrados regulares. Para mantener los triángulos firme durante la cocción, utilice un papel perforado para colocarlos directamente sobre una bandeja o plato con superficie dura (por ejemplo, metal). Esto evita que se peguen al horno o al fregadero durante el frito. Asegúrate de hacerlo con cuidado para evitar que se formen manchas en la carne durante el proceso de fritura. prompt: ### Human: "Hola, me gustaría jugar hockey sobre hielo. ¿Puedes explicar cómo funciona el juego?"### Assistant:
system:
Hockey sobre hielo es un juego de equipo en el que los jugadores utilizan un palo de hockey de madera para golpear una pelota dura llamada "paletas". El objetivo del juego es anotar goles al lado contrario del campo.

Los equipos son divididos en dos grupos de 6 jugadores cada uno. Cada equipo está formado por un portero, 5 defensores y 4 atletas. Los jugadores se colocan en la línea de la zona defensiva y de la zona ofensiva, respectivamente. Los defensores dejan a los atletas atacar el puck en la zona defensiva mientras que los atletas atacan al portero en la zona ofensiva. El portero tiende a estar parado dentro de su área propia y ataca al atacante cuando este se acerca al área defensiva. 

Los jugadores pueden pasar el puck a través del área del portero mediante un lanzamiento o un chute. El portero puede rechazar el puck y lanzarlo hacia fuera de su zona defensiva. Los atletas también pueden agarrar el puck y correr con él, lo que los convierte en "atacantes". La pelota se hace inmune cuando entra o sale del área defensiva.

Para anotar un gol, el atacante debe tocar la pelota con su paleta, luego lanzarla hacia fuera de la zona defensiva. Cuando se anota un gol, la pelota debe volver a la zona defensiva antes del siguiente turno.

El juego se puede dividir en periodos de 20 minutos y cada equipo recibe una breve pausa entre cada período. Se divide en períodos debido a que muchos jugadores se cansan rápidamente si juegan durante demasiado tiempo. Un partido típico dura entre 2-3 horas dependiendo del nivel del equipo y si hay tiempos suplementarios. El equipo con más goles ganará la partida.
source: "Hola, me gustaría jugar hockey sobre hielo. ¿Puedes explicar cómo funciona el juego?"

prompt: ### Human: "¿De qué está hecho el kevlar?"### Assistant:
system:
Kevlar is a fiber-reinforced synthetic fiber that is used to make protective gear, such as bulletproof vests. It is made of a polymer called poly-paraphenylene terephthalamide. The name "Kevlar" comes from the initials of its inventor, Stephanie Kwolek. The fiber was first developed in 1965 by DuPont, and it quickly became popular for its strength and durability.

### Structure

Kevlar is a crystalline polymer with a molecular structure that consists of long chains of carbon atoms linked together by strong hydrogen bonds. The chains are arranged in a parallel fashion, which gives Kevlar its high strength and toughness.

### Manufacturing

Kevlar is manufactured by a process called "spinning." In this process, the polymer chains are melted down and then stretched out into thin filaments. These filaments are then coated with a liquid that helps to bind them together and form a continuous thread. The threads are then woven together to form a strong, flexible fabric.

### Uses

Kevlar is used in many different applications due to its high strength and low weight. It is commonly used to make protective gear for soldiers, police officers, and firefighters, as well as sports equipment such as baseball bats and hockey sticks. It is also used in industrial applications such as ropes and cables, as well as in the manufacture of car parts such as brake pads and oil filters. Additionally, Kevlar is used in composites to increase the strength of materials such as fiberglass and carbon fiber. In these applications, Kevlar is often combined with other materials such as glass fibers or metal particles to create a composite material that has higher strength than either material on its own.

### Safety

Kevlar is generally considered safe for humans to wear or use, but it can be dangerous if it comes into contact with certain chemicals or other substances that can cause it to break down or catch fire. Additionally, some types of Kevlar may contain small amounts of formaldehyde, which can cause respiratory problems in some people. Therefore, it is important to follow safety instructions when handling or using Kevlar products to avoid any potential health risks.
source: "¿De qué está hecho el kevlar?"

prompt: ### Human: "Hola, me gustaría aprender a hacer challah. ¿Puedes darme una receta para eso?"### Assistant:
system:
Challos are a traditional Jewish bread. They are made with eggs and yeast and are often served on Jewish holidays.
Here is a recipe for challah bread.
* Ingredients:
* 1 cup warm water (105°F - 115°F)
* 3/4 cup sugar
* 2 teaspoons salt
* 4 eggs, room temperature
* 2 tablespoons yeast
* 3 cups bread flour (all-purpose flour)
* 1/2 cup honey or molasses
* 3 cups water
* Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the water, sugar, salt and eggs. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. Add the yeast and stir until it is dissolved.
2. In another bowl, mix the flour and honey or molasses. Stir until the flour is moistened.
3. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until combined. Knead the dough until it is smooth and elastic (about 8-10 minutes). Grease a bowl with oil or butter and place the dough in it. Cover with a damp towel and let rise for about an hour or until doubled in size.
4. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C). Punch down the dough and divide it into two equal pieces. Shape each piece into a braid or loaf, place on a greased baking sheet, and let rise for another 30 minutes or until doubled in size again. Brush with egg wash (1 egg beaten with 1 teaspoon of water) and bake for about 45 minutes or until golden brown.
5. Once cooked, remove from oven and allow to cool slightly before serving. Serve warm with butter or jam! Enjoy!
source: "Hola, me gustaría aprender a hacer challah. ¿Puedes darme una receta para eso?"

The abnormal hemoglobin causes the red blood cells to become sickle-shaped. These sickle-shaped cells can cause blockage of blood vessels, leading to pain and organ damage. The red blood cells with sickle-shaped can appear blue due to oxygen binding to the abnormal hemoglobin in the sickle cells.

Drugs such as methylene blue and indocyanine green can also cause blood to appear blue. Methylene blue is used in some medical tests and treatments, while indocyanine green is used as a contrast agent during certain types of medical imaging procedures.
